cast.original_title: How to Be a Latin Lover
cast.overview: An aging Latin lover gets dumped by his sugar mama and must fend for himself in a harsh world.
cast.title: How to Be a Latin Lover

details.biography: Starting his career at age three, he has been seen in many television programs during his career. Vadhir Derbez has been working as an actor since he was five years old and has appeared on all kinds of projects; for example soap operas, commercials, comedy shows, sitcoms, etc. He is currently preparing to begin a career involving music as a singer. Son of Eugenio Derbez.
details.name: Vadhir Derbez
